author: gstein
msg: The exports files are automatically rebuilt by a plain "make" at the
top-level. "make foo.exports" won't do it, and we need to live with it until
somebody finds a better way to do dynamic dependencies (portably).

author: ben
msg: Make exports.lo rebuild when it should.

author: fielding
msg: Moved hints.m4, apr_common.m4, and helpers/apr-conf.m4 into the
new apr/build directory as apr_hints.m4, apr_common.m4, apr_network.m4,

author: fielding
msg: Moved hints.m4, apr_common.m4, and helpers/apr-conf.m4 into the
new build directory as apr_hints.m4, apr_common.m4, apr_network.m4,
and apr_threads.m4.  None of the macro code has changed for this
pass -- only the location.  More changes to come.

author: trawick
msg: Get apr_sendfile() working on HP-UX.  This gets APR to build on
HP-UX without having to turn off APR_HAS_SENDFILE.
